description: The image shows a round, brown lesion with a relatively uniform color. It is surrounded by skin with hair follicles and hairs. The lesion appears to be slightly raised and has a smooth, non-irregular border.
describe_then_classify: The lesion is a well-defined, round, brown macule with a relatively uniform color. It appears to be a benign melanocytic lesion, possibly a nevus.

description: The image shows a skin lesion with a central, dark brown, irregularly shaped area surrounded by lighter, tan-colored skin. There are also five purple areas, likely marking the location of a biopsy or other procedure. The surrounding skin has a fine, reticular pattern and some visible hair follicles. The lesion appears to be relatively small, with an irregular border.
describe_then_classify: The image shows a skin lesion with a central brown pigmented area surrounded by a lighter, tan-colored area. There are also several purple marks, which appear to be ink markings made by a dermatoscope. The central brown area is irregular in shape and has a somewhat heterogeneous pigmentation. The surrounding tan area is also irregular and has a somewhat reticular appearance. The overall appearance of the central brown area is concerning for a melanocytic lesion, but further evaluation is needed to determine if it is benign or malignant.

description: The image shows a skin lesion with a pinkish-red background. There are several white, scaly patches of varying sizes and shapes within the lesion. Some of these patches appear to be peeling or flaking. There are also several dark hairs visible within the field of view. The lesion appears to be surrounded by normal skin. There are also several small, white, scaly areas within the lesion. The lesion appears to be surrounded by hair follicles and hairs. The lesion is small, and it is difficult to determine its exact size without a scale. The lesion does not appear to have any features that would suggest it is malignant. It is likely a benign lesion, such as a seborrheic keratosis or a similar benign skin growth.

description: The lesion is a small, brown, starburst-like structure with irregular borders. It appears to be located within a slightly raised, pale pink area of skin. There are several hairs visible in the surrounding skin. A ruler is visible in the bottom left corner.

description: The lesion is a small, round, brown macule with a slightly irregular border. It has a central area of darker pigmentation and a lighter, almost translucent area in the center. The surrounding skin is pink and has some fine hairs.
describe_then_classify: The lesion is a brown, relatively round, well-defined spot with a slightly irregular border. It appears to have a central darker area and a lighter halo around it. The overall appearance is consistent with a benign melanocytic nevus.

description: The lesion is a raised, dark, and crusted nodule with a central area of darker, possibly ulcerated, material. The surrounding skin shows signs of sun damage with freckles and age spots. There are also several other smaller, darker spots nearby.
describe_then_classify: The lesion appears to be a dark, crusted nodule with a surrounding area of erythema. It has a central, possibly ulcerated, area with some crusting. The surrounding skin shows evidence of sun damage with freckling and other small, darker spots. The lesion is not very well-defined and appears to be raised. It is difficult to say definitively if it is malignant or benign based on this image alone. However, given the dark color and crusted appearance, it could be a type of skin cancer such as a squamous cell carcinoma or basal cell carcinoma. Further evaluation is needed to determine the nature of this lesion.

description: The lesion appears to be a raised, irregular growth with a central crusted area and surrounding erythema.
